text: And then here on this one, tell me everything you see going on in this picture. Well, I see the mother is not paying attention and her water is running over her sink. The boy has climbed up on a ladder to steal some cookies and he's falling over. The girl is laughing. The grass is growing outside. Nobody seems to care.
